overview.title: Aluminum alloy made with four-step finishing processes
overview.text:
Sleek, robust housing crafted from diamond-polished aluminum alloy normally reserved for aircraft.
Finish created through a special brushing technique that produces a consistent, polished finish.
Sand-blasted matte sides that complement the phone's shiny CNC milled chamfer while completing its exquisite and elegant exterior.
Laser-etched rear logo produces an understated yet premium feel.

overview.title: Fingerprint identification 2.0
overview.text:
Speed and accuracy: A second-generation FPC rim-free touch fingerprint sensor that offers better performance, greater accuracy, and a 0.5-second unlocking time.
Adaptive sensor: Advanced technology that learns more about your fingerprint as you use it and prevents failed recognition caused by wet hands or partial fingerprints.
Easy setup: Fingerprint recording in just six touches.
Privacy protection: File Safe, App Lock, and Visitor Mode for added peace of mind.

overview.title: Impressive fingerprint features
overview.text:
Ability to call friends at the touch of a finger by linking a fingerprint with a contact – a feature that works in locked-screen mode.
Ability to launch an app with a single touch of a finger by linking it to a fingerprint input – a feature that works in locked-screen mode.
Ability to take photos with its fingerprint sensor, including both ordinary photos and selfies.
Notification bar control. Swipe down on the fingerprint sensor to pull down the notification bar. Double press the sensor to remove notification.
Press and hold the fingerprint sensor to answer incoming calls or cancel an alarm.

overview.title: Combination of 2 GB RAM and a Qualcomm® 64-bit Octa-core processor
overview.text:
High-speed 2 GB RAM for smooth, responsive user experience.
High-performance, low-power through SnapdragonTM big.LITTLE octa-core processor manufactured using 28 nm technology.
Ability to run 3D games seamlessly with PC-grade GPU.

overview.title: The first Honor smartphone to feature three different card slots: nano-SIM, micro-SIM, and microSD (up to 128GB)
overview.text:
This offers improved compatibility over dual nano-SIM solutions.
Simultaneous operation of three connectors - nano-SIM, micro-SIM and microSD.
Full SIM compatibility: A 4G SIM card can be inserted into either of the SIM card slots.
No distinction between a primary/secondary card, allowing for ability to choose SIM for data.
Higher-order mode ring patch antenna and automatic band switching technology that delivers stronger signal.

overview.title: Picturesque 5.5-inch, full HD, fully laminated screen
overview.text:
Pixel-by-pixel dynamic contrast adjustment for improved contrast under different lighting conditions and visibility through glare.
1920 x 1080 pixel, 16.7 million color, full HD IPS display with improved color reproduction and viewing angles.
High 72.5% screen-to-body ratio and fully-laminated screen that renders vivid and crisp images.
10 point multi-touch and manual color temperature adjustment controls.
High transparency screen protector with each device.

overview.title: Stacked 13 MP image sensor with SmartImage 3.0 image processor
overview.text:
Cutting-edge camera that captures high-quality images in a variety of different shooting scenarios.
Rear Camera: 13MP Wide F2.0 aperture, 28 mm wide angle lens with five elements and macro mode for close-up shots from just a few centimeters away
SmartImage 3.0 image processor to ensure clarity in every shot.
Ultra-strong, fingerprint-resistant cover that is even more scratch-resistant than glass.
Anti-reflective coating to increase the amount of light entering the lens, enabling the camera to take clearer shots in low-light conditions.
Front Camera: 5MP with an F2.4 aperture, 22 mm wide-angle lens with four elements, large 1.4 micron pixel size, and an 88-degree viewing angle for panoramic selfies.
Skin-beautifying algorithm for accurate color reproduction.

overview.title: Exciting new shooting modes
overview.text:
Food mode lets you capture pictures of food with stunning colors and realism.
Time-lapse mode to capture photos intervals that can be compiled into short videos.
Slow motion mode to capture video at 120 fps to enable playback at four-times slower than real life.
Perfect selfie mode and "demist" filter.
Exciting new shooting modes such as ultra-snapshot, watermarks, object tracking, and more.

overview.title: Feature-packed with EMUI 3.1
overview.text:
New privacy features let you hide home screen apps, store personal files in a safe place, and protect sensitive information.
Pop-up call reminders for incoming calls to avoid being interrupted while playing a game.
Reduced data transfer and added storage through H.265 video compression.

overview.title: Unified speaker chamber, unique smart power amplifier, and bottom speaker design
overview.text:
Unified speaker chamber, unique smart power amplifier, and bottom speaker design for crystal-clear audio quality.
Speaker volume 18.84 percent louder with excellent audio range.
Earpiece is able to handle sound 150 percent louder than competing modules, allowing you to make calls in noisy environments.

overview.title: 3000 mAh battery and SmartPower 3.0
overview.text:
Supports 2A chargers for significantly shorter charging times.
Integrated SmartPower 3.0 technology with eight-point power saving plan to reduce power consumption by 30 percent.
Battery life that lasts 1.46 days with moderate use and over a day with heavy use.
Data based on Huawei laboratory tests, actual times may vary.

specification.title: CPU
text: Qualcomm Snapdragon 615, 1.2 GHz + 1.5 GHz, Octa-core (4x1.2 GHz +4x1.5 GHz)

specification.title: Memory
text: Micro SD Card up to 128 GB

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio encoding: MP3, MIDI, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, PCM
